data.title: The biggest Italian football news site
data.meta_description: Serie A news updated throughout the day, from the top sources in Italy covering Italian football, brought to you by Football Italia
data.text:
Benfica-Juventus: VAR replaced goal-line technology in chaotic Kean goal

Referee Srdjan Jovanovic took several minutes to confirm Moise Kean's goal in Benfica-Juventus due to the lack of goal-line technology and a potential off-side. There were confusing scenes at the Estadio da…

Champions League Liveblog: Benfica-Juventus, Dinamo Zagreb-Milan

Join us for all the build-up and action as it happens from tonight’s Champions League games, as Juventus have their last chance with a trip to Benfica and Milan are…

Chelsea do Milan a Champions League favour

Chelsea have done Milan a big favour with their 2-1 victory away to RB Salzburg, as it means the Rossoneri now need four points from two games to be sure…

Nedved trusts Gatti on debut and Juventus in Champions League

Juventus vice-president Pavel Nedved still believes they can continue in the Champions League and trusts Federico Gatti will step up for his European debut against Benfica. It kicks off at…

Arrivabene: ‘Players must deserve to wear Juventus jersey’

CEO Maurizio Arrivabene has a stern warning for his team ahead of the Champions League trip to Benfica. ‘They must prove they deserve to wear the Juventus jersey.’ It kicks…

Pioli explains Milan choices to ‘spread’ Dinamo Zagreb

Stefano Pioli knows Dinamo Zagreb will defend and counter at home this evening, but believes Milan have chosen the right team to ‘spread the play’ and break them down. It…

Lukaku ready for Inter comeback, Brozovic out

Romelu Lukaku and Roberto Gagliardini are both in the squad to face Viktoria Plzen in the Champions League, but Marcelo Brozovic is out. It kicks off at San Siro on…

Champions League line-ups: Benfica vs. Juventus

Juventus rely on Dusan Vlahovic, Moise Kean and Filip Kostic for the must-win Champions League trip to Benfica, or could be eliminated tonight. It kicks off at the Estadio da…

Champions League line-ups: Dinamo Zagreb vs. Milan

Charles De Ketelaere supports Rafael Leao and Olivier Giroud, as Milan face a very tough Champions League trip to Dinamo Zagreb. It kicks off at the Stadion Maksimir at 20.00…

Cremonese back coach Alvini despite poor record

Cremonese confirm that coach Massimiliano Alvini has not been fired, despite failing to get a single victory and sitting bottom of the Serie A table. “If you ask me if…

President Saputo balances Bologna books with 40m

While Bologna fans protest President Joey Saputo for not being present enough at the Serie A club, he puts €40m into the club coffers to balance the books. Only last…

Juventus and Inter track Benfica left-back Grimaldo

Both Juventus and Inter will be keeping a close eye on Benfica left-back Alejandro Grimaldo in tonight’s Champions League clash, as he will be a free agent in July, but…

Fiorentina statement: ‘Clash with Inter directors never happened’

Fiorentina have released a statement insisting Inter President Steven Zhang and his directors never accused President Rocco Commisso of ‘aggressive and intimidating’ behaviour, blaming the media for spreading misinformation about…

Conte will discuss ‘best solution’ with Tottenham amid Juventus rumours

Antonio Conte has again refused to commit his future to Tottenham Hotspur, demanding more January reinforcements from director Fabio Paratici, as the rumours of a Juventus return remain. The former…

Tiago Pinto: ‘Mourinho fully embraced the values of Roma and the city’

Roma sporting director Tiago Pinto spoke highly about coach Jose Mourinho, suggesting that he’s now ‘a Romanista’. The 59-year-old Portuguese coach took over at the Giallorossi last year, signing a…

UN Ambassador calls on FIFA to replace Iran in World Cup with Italy

Paolo Zampolli, the Ambassador, Permanent Mission of Dominica to the United Nations, has called on FIFA president Gianni Infantino to replace Iran with Italy at the upcoming World Cup in…

Why the lack of goal-line technology in Benfica-Juventus isn’t a problem

UEFA announced today that goal-line technology won’t be available for tonight’s Champions League clash between Benfica and Juventus, but despite fan frustration this isn’t likely to be a problem. The…

Champions League: Who is Benfica-Juventus referee Jovanovic

Srdjan Jovanovic will try to keep a lid on tonight’s fiery Champions League clash between Benfica and Juventus. Here is a profile of the Serbian referee. The Bianconeri cannot afford…

Champions League: Who is Dinamo Zagreb-Milan referee Marciniak

Szymon Marciniak will be looking to keep things under control in Milan’s tense Champions League clash against Dinamo Zagreb this evening. Here is a profile of the Polish referee. The…
